INSERT INTO
loan_material_manage
( order_id, material_num, complete_date, info, gmt_create, gmt_modify )
VALUES
(#{item.orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.materialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.completeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
order_id = VALUES(order_id), material_num = VALUES(material_num), complete_date = VALUES(complete_date), info = VALUES(info), gmt_modify = VALUES(gmt_modify)
